title: SVG allows a single rx or ry to be provided
body: When the one is missing, use the value from the other.

comments.author: msftclas
comments.body:
This seems like a small (but important) contribution, so no Contribution License Agreement is required at this point. We will now review your pull request.
_Thanks,
Microsoft Pull Request Bot_

comments.author: cunnpole
comments.body: FYI: the issue only affects Rect. It doesn't seem to be possible on Ellipses as they must provide an rx and ry. If only 1 is supplied it should have been defined as a Circle with r.
